item.title: Raspberry Pi Media Server Series #1 – Installing Manjaro
item.description: Introduction So you bought a Raspberry Pi and you don’t know what should you do with it. Well, in this series I want to share my way of using my Raspberry Pi. I bet you already guessed it right by reading the title. Yes, this is the first part of my Raspberry Pi Media Server series. Before I continue, here’s what I have for this project: A full set of 2GB Raspberry Pi 4 Model B ORICO 3.
